Managing Hives

The Hive Manager allows you to create new hives (e.g., if you need more space) and to view and change hive properties (e.g., moving a hive's Archives and Cache folders).  This button appears on the Server Administration dialog.

Note: You can perform this function only on servers that are currently running.

To use the Hive Manager:

  1. On a computer that has the Server installed, select Start > Programs > StarTeam > StarTeam Server x.x > StarTeam Server. The Server Administration dialog appears.

  2. Select a server configuration. If you have not logged on already, you will be asked to do so.

  3. From the Server Administration dialog, do one of the following:

    • Click the Hive Manager shortcut in the lower left panel.

    • From the menu, select Tools > Administration > Hive Manager.

      • These actions display the Hive Manager dialog, which shows all the hives currently created for the selected server configuration.

  4. To create a new hive, click New.

  5. To view hive properties, select a hive name and click Properties.
